title: [BUG] crash when avalonia desktop run.
body: ### Description always collapse when drawing graphics, Occasionally, it does not necessarily appear, but it appears frequently. ### Code Avalonia's underlying rendered mapsui, and then the crash appears in this. ### Expected Behavior The program does not crash. ### Actual Behavior The Avalonia version is 11.3.7. The crash indeed occurred during the process of using MapInfo's query GetMapInfo(). It was retrieving MapInfo in the PointerMoved event. ### Version of SkiaSharp 3.116.0 (Current) ### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp 2.88.9 (Previous) ### IDE / Editor Visual Studio (Windows) ### Platform / Operating System Windows ### Platform / Operating System Version Win 11 ### Devices _No response_ ### Relevant Screenshots _No response_ ### Relevant Log Output ```shell ``` ### Code of Conduct - [x] I agree to follow this project's Code of Conduct
